name: Cube of Power
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
